name: Big big baller - Roller .io
description:
Roll.io Big Ball is a stick big ball rolling io game.

Roll io is very sticky, touch other stuff and make your ball bigger !

You can also crush and crash other player's that are smaller than your baller !

Game Features:
-- Free to play, play it anytime and anywhere
-- There is one simple rule. Touch and stick ! Very addictive !
-- Beat other .io players and stay as long as you can in Roll.io !
-- Lots of challenges to unlock levels for roll io !

Try to have the biggest big ball !
